custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(ul.userId)) FROM Statistics_UserLogin ul WHERE ul.loginDate BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(ul.userId)) FROM Statistics_UserLogin ul WHERE ul.loginDate BETWEEN ? AND ? AND ul.schoolId = ?
SELECT fe.extension, count(*) FROM DLFileEntry fe WHERE fe.createDate BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY fe.extension
SELECT fe.extension, count(*) FROM DLFileEntry fe JOIN Users_Orgs uo ON uo.userId = fe.userId WHERE fe.createDate BETWEEN ? AND ? AND uo.organizationId = ? GROUP BY fe.extension
SELECT count(*) FROM News_News n WHERE n.publicationDate BETWEEN ? AND ? AND n.isSchoolNews = ?
SELECT count(*) FROM News_News n JOIN Users_Orgs uo ON n.authorId = uo.userId WHERE n.publicationDate BETWEEN ? AND ? AND uo.organizationId = ? AND n.isSchoolNews = ?
SELECT count(*) FROM Messaging_Message m WHERE m.sendMessageId = 0 AND m.sendDate BETWEEN ? AND ? AND m.type_ != 3
SELECT count(*) FROM Messaging_Message m JOIN Users_Orgs uo ON m.senderId = uo.userId WHERE m.sendMessageId = 0 AND m.sendDate BETWEEN ? AND ? AND m.type_ != 3 AND uo.organizationId = ?
SELECT ch.homeworkType, COUNT(*) FROM Course_Homework ch WHERE ch.targetDate BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY ch.homeworkType
SELECT ch.homeworkType, COUNT(*) FROM Course_Homework ch JOIN Users_Orgs uo ON ch.teacherId = uo.userId WHERE ch.targetDate BETWEEN ? AND ? AND uo.organizationId = ? GROUP BY ch.homeworkType
